entry.title: Intro to Pelican
entry.content: So I recently redesigned my awful 2017 website; I wanted to start a sort of mini project and have a blog where I can post some tutorials and thoughts

entry.title: Developing with Docker-Compose
entry.summary:
Tutorial content goes here

import os

os.environ.get("DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE")

Then we can keep writing about how awesome Docker-Compose can be for developing applications locally.

As we dive in we can mention how easy it is to integrate other services but how adding more services impacts the complexity of deploying â€¦
entry.content:
Tutorial content goes here

import os

os.environ.get("DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE")

Then we can keep writing about how awesome Docker-Compose can be for developing applications locally.

As we dive in we can mention how easy it is to integrate other services but how adding more services impacts the complexity of deploying the final product to production.
